title: Key Contact Form (FID 683)
description: JSON schema for Grants.gov Key Contact form fields

OrganizationName.title: Applicant Organization Name
OrganizationName.description: Enter the legal name of the applicant that will undertake the assistance activity. This field is required.

contacts.title: Key Contact
contacts.description: Primary contact information for the project.

ProjectRole.title: Project Role
ProjectRole.description: Enter the project role of the contact person (e.g., project manager, fiscal contact).

Prefix.title: Prefix
Prefix.description: Select the Prefix from the provided list or enter a new Prefix not provided on the list.

FirstName.title: First Name
FirstName.description: Enter the First Name. This field is required.

LastName.title: Last Name
LastName.description: Enter the Last Name. This field is required.

Suffix.title: Suffix
Suffix.description: Select the Suffix from the provided list or enter a new Suffix not provided on the list.

OrganizationAffiliation.title: Organizational Affiliation
OrganizationAffiliation.description: Enter the Organizational Affiliation of the person to contact on matters related to this application.

Street1.title: Street Address Line 1
Street1.description: Enter the first line of the Street Address. This field is required.

Street2.title: Street Address Line 2
Street2.description: Enter the second line of the Street Address.

City.title: City
City.description: Enter the City. This field is required.

State.title: State
State.description: Select the state, US possession or military code from the provided list. This field is required if Country is the United States.

Country.title: Country
Country.description: Select the Country from the provided list. This field is required.

ZipPostalCode.title: Zip / Postal Code
ZipPostalCode.description: Enter the Postal Code (e.g., ZIP code). This field is required if Country is the United States.

PhoneNumber.title: Telephone Number
PhoneNumber.description: Enter the daytime Telephone Number. This field is required.

Email.title: Email
Email.description: Enter a valid Email Address. This field is required.

CountryCode.title: Country Code
CountryCode.description: GENC Standard Ed3.0 Update 11 country codes
